name: Klorets
description:
--Klorets(クロレッツ)
This is a bullet-hell shooter.
Hold down the X key to activate hyper.
Everything except you will slow down.
If you defeat an enemy during hyper, the enemy bullets will disappear.
Try to defeat  4 stage + the last boss.

---
※Japanese has been converted by deepl translation.
Grammar may be wrong.

Only character conversations are in Japanese.
There is no problem in playing.
---

◆Controls

Move: Directional Keys
Shot + slow movement: Z key
Hyper (so-called "Kakusei"): Hold down the X key
Shot + fast movement: C key

Decision, Text Forward: Z key
Back: X key

Please refer to the in-game notation for more information.

◆Rules and important specifications

Defeat the enemies that come out one after another.
The numbers at the top of the screen indicate,
Number of "scoring items" (yellow items)
Number of "Energy" (green items)
Number of remaining machines

Press and hold the X key to activate "Hyper" and slow down time. If you defeat an enemy during "Hyper", all bullets shot by that enemy will turn into "scoring items".

During "Hyper", your "energy" will gradually decrease.
You can recover by absorbing the green "energy" that appears when you defeat an enemy without using "Hyper".

For every 500 "score items" you collect, your life will increase by one. The key to survival is to use "Hyper" as soon as you feel danger and shoot the strongest enemies.

◇Other Specifications

Even if you touch all the enemies, your ship will not die.
Some bosses will attack you based on this specification.

If you continue, you will have to start from the beginning of the stage.
The number of remaining machines is 4, and the score will return to the score at the beginning of the stage.
